item.title: vExpert 2020 - 2nd Half Applications Are Open. You Should Apply.
item.description: First - if you know you want to apply to the VMware vExpert program go here: https://vexpert.vmware.com/ You only have until June 20th before applications close again - Donâ€™t Delay. If you may be unsure if you should apply, not feel confident you will make it, or just want more information about the program before applying; Keep reading. What is the VMware vExpert Program?
